name: dice slayer
description:
In this game, you will play as a dice with a variety of weapons, kill as many dice security as you can to win score. 

When you move, you will change your points and change your weapons. So please pay attention to the weapons you are using now. When you hit your enemies, their ability and loot will change too. 

Your weapon:

  • Chip pistol
  • Chip shotgun
  • Poker gun
  • Casino hammer
  • Ice shooter
  • Mahjong throwing machine

Kill these dice security guards, and get their loot such as ammo, health and even short invincibility to make your fighting continue.

How to play

WASD is move and mouse left is shoot. 

NOW my dice slayer, please fight as a doom slayer, and fight forever！

An online version of the game (If you are in mainland China, you need a VPN to open the page) :
